title: Schneider Electric Demonstrates Industry-Leading Energy Management Solutions at NECA 2023 - PR Newswire
summary: Schneider Electric is unveiling a range of innovative products at the NECA 2023 Convention & Trade Show, focusing on energy efficiency, safety, and sustainability. Key innovations include Schneider Home, a comprehensive home energy management solution that integrates energy production, storage, and control, and EcoStruxure Microgrid Flex, which simplifies microgrid configuration for faster and simpler implementation.

title: Schneider Electric Unveils Latest Texas Manufacturing Plant as Part of a $300 Million Investment in U.S. Manufacturing - PR Newswire
summary: Schneider Electric, a global leader in energy management and automation, opened a new 160,000 square foot manufacturing plant in El Paso, Texas, as part of a $300 million U.S. manufacturing investment. The plant produces custom designed low voltage and medium voltage electrical products for industrial, commercial, and residential settings, contributing to the build out of America's infrastructure and the energy transition. The new facility is part of a broader effort by Schneider Electric to enhance its U.S. manufacturing operations and create new jobs.
product_or_process: custom designed low voltage and medium voltage electrical products

title: Schneider Electric Opens Pre-Orders for Schneider Home, A First-of-its-Kind Home Energy Management Solution - PR Newswire
summary: Schneider Electric is introducing Schneider Home, an integrated home energy management system that helps homeowners manage energy production, storage, and consumption. The company is also launching EcoStruxure Microgrid Flex, a standardized microgrid solution, and the EcoXpert Microgrid Badge certification program for partners. Additionally, Schneider Electric is developing a bi-directional EV charger that allows for vehicle-to-grid and vehicle-to-home energy flow, further supporting a sustainable energy future.
product_or_process: Schneider Home, EcoStruxure Microgrid Flex, EcoXpert Microgrid Badge, and bidirectional EV charger

title: Anker SOLIX Showcases Next-Generation Home Energy Solutions at RE+ 2023 - PR Newswire
summary: Anker, a global leader in charging technology, announced its participation in RE+ 2023, showcasing its new Anker SOLIX X1 Home Energy Solution and Anker SOLIX F3800 Portable Power Station.  Anker's survey of homeowners with solar panels revealed that most purchase battery backup solutions to safeguard homes from power outages and reduce energy costs, but also to increase property value. Anker highlights the need to address consumer concerns regarding cost, space limitations, safety, and lifespan of battery backup systems.
product_or_process: Anker SOLIX X1 Home Energy Solution and Anker SOLIX F3800 Portable Power Station
